title: Chicken and smoked mozzarella quesadillas
description: This bright and flavoursome chicken recipe will bring a little taste of Mexico to your plate.
ingredients: 2 ready-to-eat cooked chicken breasts, finely diced
Â½ small red pepper, deseeded and finely diced
4 spring onions, trimmed and finely chopped
Few fresh sage leaves, finely chopped
Watercress and cherry tomatoes on the vine, to serve

method.Step 1: Put the chicken, pepper, spring onions, mozzarella and sage into a bowl. Season and mix together.

method.Step 2: Lay a tortilla flat. Scatter a quarter of the chicken mixture over it, top with another tortilla and press together. Make 3 more quesadillas in the same way.

method.Step 3: Grease 2 large frying pans with a little olive oil and put over a medium heat. Put 1 quesadilla into each pan and cook for 2 minutes, until golden. Invert on to a plate, then slide back into the pan and cook for 2 minutes, until the filling is hot and the cheese just melting. Set aside while you cook the other 2. Cut each quesadilla into 4 and serve with watercress and cherry tomatoes.
